about.title: About Soil Health Dashboard
about.subtitle: Empowering farmers with technology and insight
about.description1: Our Soil Health Dashboard is a comprehensive platform that provides region-specific soil health reports and guidance for farmers across India.
about.description2: We aim to support sustainable farming by giving accurate data, fertilizer suggestions, and access to government schemes.

features.title: Key Features
features.reportDesc: Detailed, region-wise soil data including nutrient levels and recommendations.
features.updateDesc: Live data updates to track soil health and agricultural progress.

benefits.point1: Available in multiple Indian languages for better accessibility.
benefits.point2: Helps farmers improve yield with scientific insights.
